nodes.text: Desalination tanks were devices designed to extract salt from seawater for industrial use. Four blocky gray desalination tanks were built along the side of the factory designated Coronet-SFS-14 in Coronet City on the planet Corellia.

In 13 BBY, a human worker took shelter between the tanks when the criminals Han and Qi'ra raced past in a M-68 landspeeder while fleeing from the White Worms gang's A-A4B truckspeeder, which also passed the tanks.

Desalination tanks first appeared in the 2018 Anthology Series film, Solo: A  Star Wars Story, and were first identified in the accompanying  reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo. The Corellia speeder chase locations in Solo were filmed at Fawley Power Station or Tilbury in England.
